text: aur na shapath len[1] tumamen se dhanee aur sukhee ki nahin denge sameepavartiyon tatha nirdhanon ko aur (unhen) jo hijarat kar gaye allaah kee raah mein aur chaahiye ki kshama kar den tatha jaane den! kya tum nahin chaahate ki allaah tumhen kshama kar de aur allaah ati kshamee, sahanasheel hain
